title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 153.3 - Specialty fertilizer label requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 153.3 - Specialty fertilizer label requirements

State Regulations

In addition to the label requirements of section 145 of the
law, the label of any specialty fertilizer shall conform to the
following: (a) No specialty fertilizer
bearing a label which indicates or implies the presence of a long lasting or
slowly available plant nutrient shall be distributed in this State unless the
nutrient source or sources are identified. (b) No specialty fertilizer bearing a label
which indicates or implies that the nitrogen contained therein is long lasting
or slowly available shall be distributed in this State unless the percentage of
water insoluble nitrogen contained therein is expressed and guaranteed, and is
not less than 15 percent of the total nitrogen guaranteed. (c) No specialty fertilizer bearing a label
which indicates or implies organic nitrogen content shall be distributed in
this State unless at least 60 percent of the guaranteed organic nitrogen
contained therein is water insoluble nitrogen. Notes
